title: Enhancing Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Well-Connected: Design for Social-Emotional Learning and University Wellbeing

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Participants will demonstrate a 20% or greater improvement in social relationship-building skills after six months.
Over 80% of participants will report improvements in stress management skills through monthly self-assessment surveys.
Based on team project evaluations, over 75% of participants will achieve an 'Excellent' rating in collaborative problem-solving skills.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
